public class UrlToUuidTransformer
extends AbstractLinkTransformer

URL to UUID transformer.

This transformer is applied to an XHMTL document. It processes all URL-based links to links following the LinkResolver syntax.

$Id: LinkRewritingTransformer.java,v 1.7 2004/03/16 11:12:16 gregor
